# Killian LARDE {.hero-title}

**Paris School of Economics (Master 1)** {.hero-subtitle}

I am a graduate student focused on applied microeconomics, public policy, and quantitative methods. My work combines rigorous econometric tools with policy-relevant questions, with an emphasis on transparency, reproducibility, and real-world impact.

Research interests: causal inference, public finance, labor markets.
